DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study observe inflammatory marker like TNF ( tumor necrosis factor ) , IL-1 ( interleukin-1 ) , IL-6 ( interleukin-6 ) , TREM-1 ( trigger receptor express myeloid cells-1 ) , etc , patient FUO excess-heat syndrome influence Compound Qingre Granule inflammatory marker .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Compound Qingre Granule Inflammatory Markers Patient FUO With Excess-heat Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: All case provide Infectious Diseases Department Beijing Friendship Hospital.Each patient sign inform consent . Assessing accuracy , completeness , representativeness registry data compare data medical record . After collect , sort enter data , reduce miss value , check database . The stochastic indicator method use simple random sampling , ensure probability individual give Chinese medicine intervention equal.Operations must standard reduce error . Quality assurance plan : Patient fever within two week , whose temperature 38.5 degree centigrade exclude . The registration form include following part : Name , sex , age , address , phone number , admission time , primary diagnosis level Inflammatory marker . Data analyze use SPSS17.0 ( Statistical Product Service Solutions 17.0 ) statistical software . Difference measurement data compare analysis variance , difference enumeration data compare rank-sum test.P < 0.05 statistical significance .
DOC.criteria: Patient fever unknown origin ( FUO ) . Patient fever within two week , whose temperature 38.5 degree centigrade .
